General.Description: Stronghold Digital Mining, Inc., a crypto asset mining company, focuses on mining Bitcoin in the United States. It also engages in the operation of coal refuse power generation facilities. The company was incorporated in 2021 and is headquartered in New York, New York.
General.Address: 2151 Lisbon Road, Kennerdell, PA, United States, 16374
